episodes.title: Vanguard 2017 economic and market outlook: What's ahead for 2017?
episodes.author: Vanguard
episodes.summary: A new administration, Brexit, and high market valuations are among the many things weighing on investors' minds. Vanguard Senior Investment Analyst Andrew Patterson helps make sense of it all and recaps some of the keys themes from Vanguard's 2017 economic and market outlook.

episodes.title: Do better by doing good
episodes.author: Vanguard
episodes.summary: Garrett Harbron, an investment analyst in Vanguard Investment Strategy Group, explains charitable trusts and other vehicles that can help investors who want to be givers.

episodes.title: Invest now or temporarily hold your cash?
episodes.author: Vanguard
episodes.summary: What's the best way to invest a lump sum? Dan Berkowitz of Vanguard Investment Strategy Group explores that question using insights from the latest entry in our Financial Planning Perspectives research series.

episodes.title: Year-end tax planning 2016: Tips and strategies
episodes.author: Vanguard
episodes.summary: Garrett Harbron, an investment analyst in Vanguard Investment Strategy Group, offers insights on minimizing taxes and avoiding tax surprises.

episodes.title: Why your clients need a holistic college spending plan
episodes.author: Vanguard
episodes.summary: Jonathan Kahler of Vanguard Investment Strategy Group shares tuition spending plan insights from "Tackling the tuition bill: Managing higher education expenses," the first entry in our Financial Planning Perspectives research series.

episodes.title: What's driving strong flows into fixed income?
episodes.author: Vanguard
episodes.summary: Edward Saracino, a senior product manager in Vanguard's Portfolio Review Department, details some of the factors contributing to recent significant inflows to the fixed income market and to municipal bonds in particular. He also explains how costs and a portfolio manager's approach can affect risk and, by extension, influence investor returns.

episodes.title: A new approach to retirement spending
episodes.author: Vanguard
episodes.summary: Michael DiJoseph of Vanguard Investment Strategy Group offers alternatives to conventional retirement planning in this podcast. He details Vanguard's dynamic approach to retirement spending and explains why it can help investors maintain income and help preserve their retirement portfolios.

episodes.title: Should investors care about the BRICS in 2016?
episodes.author: Vanguard
episodes.summary: In this podcast, Jonathan Lemco of Vanguard Investment Strategy Group discusses the current state of emerging markets and how investors can use emerging markets to add diversification to their portfolio and offer the potential for growth.

episodes.title: The allure of alternative investments
episodes.author: Vanguard
episodes.summary: In this podcast, Doug Grim of Vanguard Investment Strategy Group breaks down alternative investments and how to use them in portfolios.

episodes.title: Social Security: Getting the most benefit
episodes.author: Vanguard
episodes.summary: In this podcast, Jonathan Kahler of Vanguard Investment Strategy Group details ways individuals and couples can get more out of Social Security.

episodes.title: Roth IRAs: A tool for wealth transfer across generations
episodes.author: Vanguard
episodes.summary: In this podcast, Maria Bruno of Vanguard Investment Strategy Group shares how a Roth IRA can help you transfer wealth to your loved ones across multiple generations.

episodes.title: Portfolio rebalancing: Why it's important, what to consider
episodes.author: Vanguard
episodes.summary: In this podcast, Yan Zilbering, an investment analyst in Vanguard Investment Strategy Group, talks about best practices for portfolio rebalancing.

episodes.title: Looking beyond performance
episodes.author: Vanguard
episodes.summary: in this podcast, Michael DiJoseph, an investment analyst in Vanguard Investment Strategy Group, discusses findings from an upcoming whitepaper that explores some everyday mental shortcuts that could mislead clients as they make investment decisions

episodes.title: Guarded, not bearish: Spotlight on Vanguard's economic and investment outlook
episodes.author: Vanguard
episodes.summary: In this podcast, Andrew Patterson, a senior analyst in Vanguard Investment Strategy Group, provides an overview of the 2016 edition of Vanguard's economic and investment outlook.

episodes.title: Exploring the choice between ETFs and mutual funds
episodes.author: Vanguard
episodes.summary: In this podcast, Joel Dickson, Vanguard's global head of investment research and development, examines traits that distinguish exchange-traded funds (ETFs) and mutual funds and provides an analysis of investor behavior regarding their purchase.
